practice_phrases: 你能给我
can you give me
你能给我那个吗？
can you give me that?
你能给我这个词吗？
can you give me this word?
你能给我那本书吗？
can you give me that book?
你能给我几分钟吗？
can you give me a few minutes?
你能明天早上给我那个吗？
can you give me that tomorrow morning?
你能在餐厅给我那个吗？
can you give me that at the restaurant?
你能在星期六晚上给我那本书吗？
can you give me that book on Saturday night?
你能在星期天早上给我那个词吗？
can you give me that word on Sunday morning?
你能在那里给我用中文说这个词吗？
can you give me this word in Chinese there?
那本书
that book
你能给我那本书
can you give me that book
我不介意等那本书
I don't mind waiting for that book
我试图说那本书
I'm trying to say that book
你怎么说那本书？
how do you say that book?
我明天早上给你那本书
I'll give you that book tomorrow morning
你想在餐厅谈那本书吗？
do you want to talk about that book at the restaurant?
我不能在星期六晚上给你那本书
I won't be able to give you that book on Saturday night
你能在星期天早上用中文说那本书吗？
can you say that book in Chinese on Sunday morning?
如果我知道，我会给你那本书
if I had known, I would have given you that book

Sunday morning

你能在星期天早上用中文说那本书吗？

我们在星期天早上谈点别的吧
